Are your pets getting older? Recovering from surgery? Or do they simply just deserve to be pampered? If any of these are true, you won’t do much better than getting your favorite canine or feline a shredded foam pet bed.
;Pet beds come in a multitude of varieties, but one of the most luxurious and versatile varieties of a ;bed cushion; for pets is shredded foam. These beds can be filled with any level of foam density depending on the needs of your pet, and even the foam variety itself can be selected, from normal polyurethane foam to memory foam or even latex foam.
;Shredded foam works for your pet the same way a shredded foam pillow or bean bag chair does for people. The compressible material forms and shifts to the contours of your pet’s body, giving them comfortable, pressure-free support. For pets suffering from arthritis or hip dysplasia, this can make a huge difference in their comfort levels. Utilizing shredded foam gives you more versatility than a solid pad bed as well, because you can add or remove filling from most covers.

As something we use every night, pillows deserve more attention than they get. They’re just as important as your mattress for giving you a comfortable, restful sleep, but people tend to overlook pillows and use them like any old thing will do. But as anyone who has benefitted from carefully selecting their ;bedroom pillows;knows, they can make a huge difference and there are choices out there for any type of sleeper.
